### Load Libraries
```{r}
library(BiocManager)
library(Biostrings)
library(muscle)
library(ape)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
```

### Load Data
```{r}
MyData<-read.csv("ChrISequences.csv")
str(MyData)
```
### Clean up Data
```{r}
MyData$Sequence<-gsub("[^ATCG]", "", MyData$Sequence)
```

```{r}
MyData
```
### Align Sequences

```{r}
DataDNAstring<-DNAStringSet(MyData$Sequence)
```


```{r}
names(DataDNAstring)<-paste(1:nrow(MyData), MyData$X, sep="_")
```

```{r}
DataAlign<-muscle::muscle(stringset = DataDNAstring, quiet = T)
```

```{r}
DataAlign
```

### Distance Matrix

```{r}
DataAlignBin<-as.DNAbin(DataAlign)
DataDM<-dist.dna(DataAlignBin, model = "K80")
class(DataDM)
```

```{r}
length(DataDM)
```

```{r}
DataDMmat<-as.matrix(DataDM)
dim(DataDMmat)
```

```{r}
View(DataDMmat)
```


```{r}
DataDat<-melt(DataDMmat)
dim(DataDat)
```

```{r}
View(DataDat)
```
